body_html: Sure, we'll be happy to merge this if you get around implementing it. Actually softmax_backward is exposed in Python as torch._C._nn.softmax_backward_out (check out torch/csrc/autograd/generated/python_nn_functions.cpp for more details).
body_text: Sure, we'll be happy to merge this if you get around implementing it. Actually softmax_backward is exposed in Python as torch._C._nn.softmax_backward_out (check out torch/csrc/autograd/generated/python_nn_functions.cpp for more details).
body: Sure, we'll be happy to merge this if you get around implementing it. Actually `softmax_backward` is exposed in Python as `torch._C._nn.softmax_backward_out` (check out `torch/csrc/autograd/generated/python_nn_functions.cpp` for more details).
